name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: This week, Secretary of State Rex Tillerson said that Russia isn’t acting like a “responsible nation.” President Trump agreed, saying, “They haven’t paid me in months.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: People are mad at President Trump for meeting with Native American leaders in front of a portrait of anti-Native American president Andrew Jackson. Even worse, today President Trump met with Hispanic leaders in front of a portrait of President Trump.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Genealogy experts say that Prince Harry and his fiancée Meghan Markle are actually distant cousins. After hearing they were related, Queen Elizabeth finally gave the couple her blessing.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Bernie Sanders has been nominated for a Grammy Award for best audiobook. Of course, Bernie supporters are already complaining that the Grammys are rigged so that Hillary will win.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Arby’s has acquired Buffalo Wild Wings for $2.4 billion. They didn’t mean to, but like a lot of us, Arby’s got drunk and bought too many wings.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: MTV announced it's bringing back the original cast of “Jersey Shore.” Can you believe it? Every single cast member was available!

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: In Indiana, a high school teacher was caught in her classroom snorting cocaine. People became suspicious when parent-teacher conferences lasted only 10 seconds.
